Announcement.description: Represents an announcement set by an administrator.
Announcement.exampleJson:
{ "id": "8", "content": "

Looks like there was an issue processing audio attachments without embedded art since yesterday due to an experimental new feature. That issue has now been fixed, so you may see older posts with audio from other servers pop up in your feeds now as they are being finally properly processed. Sorry!

", "starts_at": null, "ends_at": null, "all_day": false, "published_at": "2020-07-03T01:27:38.726Z", "updated_at": "2020-07-03T01:27:38.752Z", "read": true, "mentions": [], "statuses": [], "tags": [], "emojis": [], "reactions": [ { "name": "bongoCat", "count": 9, "me": false, "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/original/fdba57dff7576d53.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/067/715/static/fdba57dff7576d53.png" }, { "name": "thonking", "count": 1, "me": false, "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/original/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/098/690/static/a8d36edc4a7032e8.png" }, { "name": "AAAAAA", "count": 1, "me": false, "url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/original/AAAAAA.png", "static_url": "https://files.mastodon.social/custom_emojis/images/000/071/387/static/AAAAAA.png" }, { "name": "🤔", "count": 1, "me": true } ] }

ExtendedDescription.description: Represents an extended description for the instance, to be shown on its about page.
ExtendedDescription.name: ExtendedDescription
ExtendedDescription.exampleJson:
{ "updated_at":"2022-11-03T04:09:07Z", "content":"

For inquiries not related specifically to the operation of this server, such as press inquiries, please contact press@joinmastodon.org.

Funding

This server is crowdfunded by Patreon donations. For a list of sponsors, see joinmastodon.org.

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

Impressum

Mastodon gGmbH
Mühlenstraße 8a
14167 Berlin
Germany

E-Mail-Adresse: hello@joinmastodon.org

Vertretungsberechtigt: Eugen Rochko (Geschäftsführer)

Umsatzsteuer Identifikationsnummer (USt-ID): DE344258260

Handelsregister
Geführt bei: Amtsgericht Charlottenburg
Nummer: HRB 230086 B

" }

properties.name: configuration[statuses][max_media_attachments]

properties.name: configuration[statuses][characters_reserved_per_url]
properties.description: Each URL in a status will be assumed to be exactly this many characters.

properties.description: Hints for which attachments will be accepted.
Contains MIME types that can be uploaded.
properties.name: configuration[media_attachments][supported_mime_types]

The maximum number of pixels (width times height) for image uploads.
properties.name: configuration[media_attachments][image_matrix_limit]
configuration[media_attachments][video_size_limit]
properties.description: The maximum size of any uploaded video, in bytes.

properties.name: configuration[media_attachments][video_frame_rate_limit]
properties.description: The maximum frame rate for any uploaded video.
The maximum number of pixels (width times height) for video uploads.
properties.name: configuration[media_attachments][video_matrix_limit]

properties.description: Limits related to polls.
Each poll is allowed to have up to this many options.

properties.description: Each poll option is allowed to have this many characters.
properties.name: configuration[polls][max_characters_per_option]

properties.description: The shortest allowed poll duration, in seconds.
properties.name: configuration[polls][min_expiration]

properties.description: The longest allowed poll duration, in seconds.
properties.name: configuration[polls][max_expiration]

properties.description: A user that can be contacted, as an alternative to `email`.

V1::Instance.exampleJson:
{
  "uri":"mastodon.social",
  "title":"Mastodon",
  "short_description":"The original server operated by the Mastodon gGmbH non-profit",
  "description":"",
  "email":"staff@mastodon.social",
  "version":"3.5.3",
  "urls":{
    "streaming_api":"wss://mastodon.social"
  },
  "stats":{
    "user_count":812303,
    "status_count":38151616,
    "domain_count":25255
  },
  "thumbnail":"https://files.mastodon.social/site_uploads/files/000/000/001/original/vlcsnap-2018-08-27-16h43m11s127.png",
  "languages":[
    "en"
  ],
  "registrations":false,
  "approval_required":false,
  "invites_enabled":true,
  "configuration":{
    "statuses":{
      "max_characters":500,
      "max_media_attachments":4,
      "characters_reserved_per_url":23
    },
    "media_attachments":{
      "supported_mime_types":[
        "image/jpeg",
        "image/png",
        "image/gif",
        "image/webp",
        "video/webm",
        "video/mp4",
        "video/quicktime",
        "video/ogg",
        "audio/wave",
        "audio/wav",
        "audio/x-wav",
        "audio/x-pn-wave",
        "audio/vnd.wave",
        "audio/ogg",
        "audio/vorbis",
        "audio/mpeg",
        "audio/mp3",
        "audio/webm",
        "audio/flac",
        "audio/aac",
        "audio/m4a",
        "audio/x-m4a",
        "audio/mp4",
        "audio/3gpp",
        "video/x-ms-asf"
      ],
      "image_size_limit":10485760,
      "image_matrix_limit":16777216,
      "video_size_limit":41943040,
      "video_frame_rate_limit":60,
      "video_matrix_limit":2304000
    },
    "polls":{
      "max_options":4,
      "max_characters_per_option":50,
      "min_expiration":300,
      "max_expiration":2629746
    }
  },
  "contact_account":{
    "id":"1",
    "username":"Gargron",
    "acct":"Gargron",
    "display_name":"Eugen",
    "locked":false,
    "bot":false,
    "discoverable":true,
    "group":false,
    "created_at":"2016-03-16T00:00:00.000Z",
    "note":"\u003cp\u003eFounder, CEO and lead developer \u003cspan class=\"h-card\"\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://mastodon.social/@Mastodon\" class=\"u-url mention\"\u003e@\u003cspan\u003eMastodon\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e, Germany.\u003c/p\u003e",
    "url":"https://mastodon.social/@Gargron",
    "avatar":"https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/000/000/001/original/dc4286ceb8fab734.jpg",
    "avatar_static":"https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/000/000/001/original/dc4286ceb8fab734.jpg",
    "header":"https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/headers/000/000/001/original/3b91c9965d00888b.jpeg",
    "header_static":"https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/headers/000/000/001/original/3b91c9965d00888b.jpeg",
    "followers_count":118944,
    "following_count":305,
    "statuses_count":72309,
    "last_status_at":"2022-08-24",
    "emojis":[
      
    ],
    "fields":[
      {
        "name":"Patreon",
        "value":"\u003ca href=\"https://www.patreon.com/mastodon\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener noreferrer me\"\u003e\u003cspan class=\"invisible\"\u003ehttps://www.\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan class=\"\"\u003epatreon.com/mastodon\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan class=\"invisible\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e",
        "verified_at":null
      }
    ]
  },
  "rules":[
    {
      "id":"1",
      "text":"Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting"
    },
    {
      "id":"2",
      "text":"No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism"
    },
    {
      "id":"3",
      "text":"No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies"
    },
    {
      "id":"4",
      "text":"No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users"
    },
    {
      "id":"5",
      "text":"No content illegal in Germany"
    },
    {
      "id":"7",
      "text":"Do not share intentionally false or misleading information"
    }
  ]
}
V1::Instance.name: V1::Instance
V1::Instance.description: Represents the software instance of Mastodon running on this domain.

Trends::Link.description: Represents a rich preview card that is generated using OpenGraph tags from a URL.

properties.name: history
properties.description: Usage statistics for given days (typically the past week).

properties.name: history[][day]
properties.description: UNIX timestamp on midnight of the given day.

properties.name: history[][accounts]
properties.description: The counted accounts using the link within that day.

properties.name: history[][uses]
properties.description: The counted statuses using the link within that day.

ScheduledStatus.description: Represents a status that will be published at a future scheduled date.
ScheduledStatus.name: ScheduledStatus
ScheduledStatus.exampleJson:
{
  "id": "1",
  "scheduled_at": "2022-09-29T00:00:00.000Z",
  "params": {
    "poll": null,
    "text": "test post",
    "language": null,
    "media_ids": null,
    "sensitive": null,
    "visibility": null,
    "idempotency": null,
    "scheduled_at": null,
    "spoiler_text": null,
    "application_id": 3,
    "in_reply_to_id": null,
    "with_rate_limit": false
  },
  "media_attachments": []
}

properties.description: ID of the scheduled status in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The timestamp for when the status will be posted.
properties.name: scheduled_at

properties.description: The parameters that were used when scheduling the status, to be used when the status is posted.
properties.name: params

properties.description: Text to be used as status content.
properties.name: params[text]
params[poll]
properties.description: Poll to be attached to the status.

properties.name: params[poll][options[]]
properties.description: The poll options to be used.

properties.name: params[poll][expires_in]
properties.description: How many seconds the poll should last before closing.

properties.name: params[poll][multiple]
properties.description: Whether the poll allows multiple choices.

properties.name: params[poll][hide_totals]
properties.description: Whether the poll should hide total votes until after voting has ended.
IDs of the MediaAttachments that will be attached to the status.
properties.name: params[media_ids]

properties.description: Whether the status will be marked as sensitive.
properties.name: params[sensitive]
params[spoiler_text]
properties.description: The text of the content warning or summary for the status.
The visibility that the status will have once it is posted.
properties.name: params[visibility]

properties.description: ID of the Status that will be replied to.
properties.name: params[in_reply_to_id]

properties.description: The language that will be used for the status.
properties.name: params[language]

properties.description: ID of the Application that posted the status.
properties.name: params[application_id]

properties.description: When the status will be scheduled. This will be null because the status is only scheduled once.
properties.name: params[scheduled_at]
params[idempotency]
properties.description: Idempotency key to prevent duplicate statuses.
Whether the status should be rate limited <!-- TODO: What does this mean -->.
properties.name: params[with_rate_limit]

properties.description: Media that will be attached when the status is posted.
properties.name: media_attachments

properties.description: The ID of the report in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: Whether an action was taken yet.
properties.name: action_taken

properties.description: When an action was taken against the report.
properties.name: action_taken_at
category
properties.description: The generic reason for the report.
The reason for the report.
properties.name: comment
forwarded
properties.description: Whether the report was forwarded to a remote domain.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: When the report was created.
IDs of statuses that have been attached to this report for additional context.
properties.name: status_ids
rule_ids
properties.description: IDs of the rules that have been cited as a violation by this report.

properties.name: target_account
properties.description: The account that was reported.

Report.name: Report
Report.exampleJson:
{ "id": "48914", "action_taken": false, "action_taken_at": null, "category": "spam", "comment": "Spam account", "forwarded": false, "created_at": "2022-08-25T09:56:16.763Z", "status_ids": [ "108882889550545820" ], "rule_ids": null, "target_account": { "id": "108366849347798387", "username": "Baluke", "acct": "Baluke", "display_name": "Baluke Dental Studios", "locked": false, "bot": false, "discoverable": false, "group": false, "created_at": "2022-05-26T00:00:00.000Z", "note": "

Baluke Dental Studios is a full service dental lab offering fabrication, staining, and digital services. Advanced technologies and a meticulous process ensure reduced chair time, lower costs, and better patient outcomes with beautiful smiles. Talk to a representative today.

https://baluke.com/

", "url": "https://mastodon.social/@Baluke", "avatar": "https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/108/366/849/347/798/387/original/dbcfe99ed5def0f4.png", "avatar_static": "https://files.mastodon.social/accounts/avatars/108/366/849/347/798/387/original/dbcfe99ed5def0f4.png", "header": "https://static-cdn.mastodon.social/headers/original/missing.png", "header_static": "https://static-cdn.mastodon.social/headers/original/missing.png", "followers_count": 0, "following_count": 0, "statuses_count": 38, "last_status_at": "2022-08-25", "emojis": [], "fields": [] } }

  "height": 0,
  "image": null,
  "embed_url": "",
  "blurhash": null
}

properties.description: Should the filter consider word boundaries? See [implementation guidelines for filters]({{< relref "api/guidelines#filters" >}}).

{ "id": "103270115826048975", "created_at": "2019-12-08T03:48:33.901Z", "in_reply_to_id": null, "in_reply_to_account_id": null, "sensitive": false, "spoiler_text": "", "visibility": "public", "language": "en", "uri": "https://mastodon.social/users/Gargron/statuses/103270115826048975", "url": "https://mastodon.social/@Gargron/103270115826048975", "replies_count": 5, "reblogs_count": 6, "favourites_count": 11, "favourited": false, "reblogged": false, "muted": false, "bookmarked": false, "content": "

"I lost my inheritance with one wrong digit on my sort code"

Status.description: Represents a status posted by an account.

properties.description: ID of the status in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: URI of the status used for federation.
properties.name: uri
created_at
properties.description: The date when this status was created.
The account that authored this status.
properties.name: account
content
properties.description: HTML-encoded status content.
Visibility of this status.
properties.name: visibility
sensitive
properties.description: Is this status marked as sensitive content?

properties.name: spoiler_text
properties.description: Subject or summary line, below which status content is collapsed until expanded.
Media that is attached to this status.
properties.name: media_attachments
application
properties.description: The application used to post this status.
The name of the application that posted this status.
properties.name: application[name]
application[website]
properties.description: The website associated with the application that posted this status.
Mentions of users within the status content.
properties.name: mentions

properties.description: Hashtags used within the status content.
properties.name: tags

properties.description: Custom emoji to be used when rendering status content.
properties.name: emojis

properties.description: How many boosts this status has received.
properties.name: reblogs_count
favourites_count
properties.description: How many favourites this status has received.

properties.name: replies_count
properties.description: How many replies this status has received.

properties.name: url
properties.description: A link to the status's HTML representation.

properties.name: in_reply_to_id
properties.description: ID of the status being replied to.

properties.name: in_reply_to_account_id
properties.description: ID of the account that authored the status being replied to.

properties.name: reblog
properties.description: The status being reblogged.
The poll attached to the status.
properties.name: poll
card
properties.description: Preview card for links included within status content.
Primary language of this status.
properties.name: language

properties.description: Plain-text source of a status. Returned instead of `content` when status is deleted, so the user may redraft from the source text without the client having to reverse-engineer the original text from the HTML content.
properties.name: text
edited_at
properties.description: Timestamp of when the status was last edited.
If the current token has an authorized user: Have you favourited this status?
properties.name: favourited

properties.description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you boosted this status?
properties.name: reblogged

properties.description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you muted notifications for this status's conversation?
properties.name: muted

properties.description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you bookmarked this status?
properties.name: bookmarked
pinned
properties.description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you pinned this status? Only appears if the status is pinnable.
If the current token has an authorized user: The filter and keywords that matched this status.
properties.name: filtered

properties.description: The text value of the poll option.
properties.name: title
votes_count
properties.description: The total number of received votes for this option.

Poll::Option.description: Represents a poll attached to a status.
Poll::Option.name: Poll::Option

Application.name: Application
Application.description: Represents an application that interfaces with the REST API to access accounts or post statuses.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of your application.

properties.name: website
properties.description: The website associated with your application.

properties.name: vapid_key
properties.description: Used for Push Streaming API. Returned with [POST /api/v1/apps]({{< relref "methods/apps#create" >}}). Equivalent to [WebPushSubscription#server_key]({{< relref "entities/WebPushSubscription#server_key" >}})

properties.name: client_id
properties.description: Client ID key, to be used for obtaining OAuth tokens

properties.name: client_secret
properties.description: Client secret key, to be used for obtaining OAuth tokens
The IP address.
properties.name: ip
used_at
properties.description: The timestamp of when the IP address was last used for this account.

Admin::Ip.name: Admin::Ip
Admin::Ip.description: Represents an IP address associated with a user.

properties.description: The ID of the poll in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: When the poll ends.
properties.name: expires_at
expired
properties.description: Is the poll currently expired?

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Does the poll allow multiple-choice answers?
How many votes have been received.
properties.name: votes_count
voters_count
properties.description: How many unique accounts have voted on a multiple-choice poll.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Possible answers for the poll.

properties.name: emojis
properties.description: Custom emoji to be used for rendering poll options.

properties.name: voted
properties.description: When called with a user token, has the authorized user voted?
When called with a user token, which options has the authorized user chosen? Contains an array of index values for `options`.
properties.name: own_votes

Poll.description: Represents a poll attached to a status.
Poll.name: Poll

Admin::Account.name: Admin::Account

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the account in the database.

properties.name: username
properties.description: The username of the account.

properties.name: domain
properties.description: The domain of the account, if it is remote.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: When the account was first discovered.

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email address associated with the account.
The IP address last used to login to this account.
properties.name: ip
ips
properties.description: All known IP addresses associated with this account.
The locale of the account.
properties.name: locale
invite_request
properties.description: The reason given when requesting an invite (for instances that require manual approval of registrations)
The current role of the account.
properties.name: role

properties.description: Whether the account has confirmed their email address.
properties.name: confirmed

properties.description: Whether the account is currently approved.
properties.name: approved

properties.description: Whether the account is currently disabled.
properties.name: disabled
silenced
properties.description: Whether the account is currently silenced

properties.name: suspended
properties.description: Whether the account is currently suspended.
User-level information about the account.
properties.name: account
created_by_application_id
properties.description: The ID of the [Application]({{< relref "entities/application" >}}) that created this account, if applicable.
The ID of the [Account]({{< relref "entities/account" >}}) that invited this user, if applicable.
properties.name: invited_by_account_id

Conversation.name: Conversation
Conversation.description: Represents a conversation with "direct message" visibility.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the conversation in the database.

properties.name: unread
properties.description: Is the conversation currently marked as unread?
Participants in the conversation.
properties.name: accounts
last_status
properties.description: The last status in the conversation.

Deprecated.description: Represents a file or media attachment that can be added to a status.
Deprecated.name: Deprecated

properties.name: text_url
properties.description: A shorter URL for the attachment.
